name: terraform-monitor-lambda
description: Monitors a Terraform repository and reports on unapplied changes

scripts.lint: npm run lint-versions && npm run lint-ts && npm run lint-prettier && echo lint OK
scripts.build: echo 'var lambda = exports;' > dist/index.js && browserify -p tsify --node --external aws-sdk src/index.ts >> dist/index.js && zip dist/lambda.zip dist/index.js

author: Jarno Rantanen <jarno@jrw.fi>
